## Functions

### DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingBackwardScan() {#ac10429a8c82694552d49e1aba0b85491}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingBackwardScan (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Remove redundant instructions within sequences of consecutive dbg.value instructions.

This is done using a backward scan to keep the last dbg.value describing a specific variable/fragment.

<Link id="details" />


## BackwardScan strategy:



Given a sequence of consecutive <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgvalueinst">DbgValueInst</a> like this



dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;) dbg.value ..., &quot;y&quot;, FragmentY1 dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX2 dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;&#42;)



then the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed (it is guaranteed to be obsoleted by the instruction marked with (&#42;&#42;) as the latter instruction is describing the same variable using the same fragment info).



Possible improvements:
<ul>
<li><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> fully overlapping fragments and not only identical fragments.</li>
<li>Support dbg.declare. dbg.label, and possibly other meta instructions being part of the sequence of consecutive instructions.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00386">386</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/basicblockutils-cpp">BasicBlockUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingForwardScan() {#a961e2695793920fc477be3d95e20babe}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingForwardScan (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Remove redundant dbg.value instructions using a forward scan.

This can remove a dbg.value instruction that is redundant due to indicating that a variable has the same value as already being indicated by an earlier dbg.value.

<Link id="details" />


## ForwardScan strategy:



Given two identical dbg.value instructions, separated by a block of instructions that isn&#39;t describing the same variable, like this



dbg.value X1, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;&#42;) &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt; dbg.value X1, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;)



then the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed. Variable &quot;x&quot; is already described as being mapped to the SSA value X1.



Possible improvements:
<ul>
<li>Keep track of non-overlapping fragments.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00503">503</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/basicblockutils-cpp">BasicBlockUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### removeUndefDbgAssignsFromEntryBlock() {#a579e878e02e34bf9699e3d82da2bc070}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool removeUndefDbgAssignsFromEntryBlock (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Remove redundant undef dbg.assign intrinsic from an entry block using a forward scan.

<Link id="details" />


## Strategy:



Scanning forward, delete dbg.assign intrinsics iff they are undef, not linked to an intrinsic, and don&#39;t share an aggregate variable with a debug intrinsic that didn&#39;t meet the criteria. In other words, undef dbg.assigns that come before non-undef debug intrinsics for the variable are deleted. Given:



dbg.assign undef, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;) &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt; dbg.value V, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX2 &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt; dbg.assign undef, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1



then (only) the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed. Possible improvements:
<ul>
<li>Keep track of non-overlapping fragments.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00647">647</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/basicblockutils-cpp">BasicBlockUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add insert edges first. Experimentally, for the particular case of two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks that can be merged, with a single successor and single predecessor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// respectively, it is beneficial to have all insert updates first. Deleting</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// edges first may lead to unreachable blocks, followed by inserting edges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// making the blocks reachable again. Such DT updates lead to high compile</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// times. We add inserts before deletes here to reduce compile time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Remove redundant instructions within sequences of consecutive dbg.value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions. This is done using a backward scan to keep the last dbg.value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="comment">/// describing a specific variable/fragment.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BackwardScan strategy:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ----------------------</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given a sequence of consecutive DbgValueInst like this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="comment">///   dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1  (&#42;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="comment">///   dbg.value ..., &quot;y&quot;, FragmentY1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="comment">///   dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="comment">///   dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1  (&#42;&#42;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="comment">/// then the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed (it is guaranteed to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="comment">/// obsoleted by the instruction marked with (&#42;&#42;) as the latter instruction is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="comment">/// describing the same variable using the same fragment info).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Possible improvements:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - Check fully overlapping fragments and not only identical fragments.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - Support dbg.declare. dbg.label, and possibly other meta instructions being</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="comment">///   part of the sequence of consecutive instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386" lineLink="#ac10429a8c82694552d49e1aba0b85491"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#ac10429a8c82694552d49e1aba0b85491">DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingBackwardScan</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;DbgVariableRecord &#42;, 8&gt;</a> ToBeRemoved;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldenseset">SmallDenseSet&lt;DebugVariable&gt;</a> VariableSet;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(&#42;BB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgrecord">DbgRecord</a> &amp;DR : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getDbgRecordRange())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;DbgLabelRecord&gt;</a>(DR)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emulate existing behaviour (see comment below for dbg.declares).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Remove redundant dbg.value instructions using a forward scan. This can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="comment">/// remove a dbg.value instruction that is redundant due to indicating that a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="comment">/// variable has the same value as already being indicated by an earlier</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="comment">/// dbg.value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ForwardScan strategy:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ---------------------</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given two identical dbg.value instructions, separated by a block of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions that isn&#39;t describing the same variable, like this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="comment">///   dbg.value X1, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1  (&#42;&#42;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="comment">///   dbg.value X1, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1  (&#42;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="comment">/// then the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed. Variable &quot;x&quot; is already</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="comment">/// described as being mapped to the SSA value X1.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Possible improvements:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - Keep track of non-overlapping fragments.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503" lineLink="#a961e2695793920fc477be3d95e20babe"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#a961e2695793920fc477be3d95e20babe">DbgVariableRecordsRemoveRedundantDbgInstrsUsingForwardScan</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;DbgVariableRecord &#42;, 8&gt;</a> ToBeRemoved;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Remove redundant undef dbg.assign intrinsic from an entry block using a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="comment">/// forward scan.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Strategy:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ---------------------</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Scanning forward, delete dbg.assign intrinsics iff they are undef, not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="comment">/// linked to an intrinsic, and don&#39;t share an aggregate variable with a debug</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="comment">/// intrinsic that didn&#39;t meet the criteria. In other words, undef dbg.assigns</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that come before non-undef debug intrinsics for the variable are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="comment">/// deleted. Given:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="comment">///   dbg.assign undef, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1 (&#42;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="comment">///   dbg.value %V, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &lt;block of instructions, none being &quot;dbg.value ..., &quot;x&quot;, ...&quot;&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="comment">///   dbg.assign undef, &quot;x&quot;, FragmentX1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="comment">/// then (only) the instruction marked with (&#42;) can be removed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Possible improvements:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - Keep track of non-overlapping fragments.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647" lineLink="#a579e878e02e34bf9699e3d82da2bc070"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a579e878e02e34bf9699e3d82da2bc070">removeUndefDbgAssignsFromEntryBlock</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#ab571b8358a3a8b6db1327d06bdc5e9f4">IsNewDbgInfoFormat</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#aa1970a96b57d122e4bb765d0f82e96e6">DbgVariableRecordsRemoveUndefDbgAssignsFromEntryBlock</a>(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4ec05121d4b54b3691ad6203e78ff54e">isEntryBlock</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;expected entry block&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;DbgAssignIntrinsic &#42;, 8&gt;</a> ToBeRemoved;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a08f3f942afc0ee9115a8f9fa87e9191d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a08f3f942afc0ee9115a8f9fa87e9191d">llvm::RemoveRedundantDbgInstrs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MadeChanges = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// By using the &quot;backward scan&quot; strategy before the &quot;forward scan&quot; strategy we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can remove both dbg.value (2) and (3) in a situation like this:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (1) dbg.value V1, &quot;x&quot;, DIExpression()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (2) dbg.value V2, &quot;x&quot;, DIExpression()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (3) dbg.value V1, &quot;x&quot;, DIExpression()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we need to preserve LoopInfo, note whether any of the preds crosses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!L)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (L-&gt;contains(Pred))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><Highlight kind="normal">      IsLoopEntry = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><Highlight kind="normal">      SplitMakesNewLoopHeader = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Unless we have a loop for OldBB, nothing else to do here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!L)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsLoopEntry) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the new block to the nearest enclosing loop (and not an adjacent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop). To find this, examine each of the predecessors and determine which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loops enclose them, and select the most-nested loop which contains the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop containing the block being split.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;InnermostPredLoop = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred : Preds) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;PredLoop = LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(Pred)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Seek a loop which actually contains the block being split (to avoid</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// adjacent loops).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PredLoop &amp;&amp; !PredLoop-&gt;contains(OldBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><Highlight kind="normal">          PredLoop = PredLoop-&gt;getParentLoop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Select the most-nested of these loops which contains the block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PredLoop &amp;&amp; PredLoop-&gt;contains(OldBB) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><Highlight kind="normal">            (!InnermostPredLoop ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><Highlight kind="normal">             InnermostPredLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a57994482c17097d9f936acff3a6598ac">getLoopDepth</a>() &lt; PredLoop-&gt;getLoopDepth()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><Highlight kind="normal">          InnermostPredLoop = PredLoop;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InnermostPredLoop)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><Highlight kind="normal">      InnermostPredLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a63f099d3bf7cf97eb3ae2d630e3d1afc">addBasicBlockToLoop</a>(NewBB, &#42;LI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><Highlight kind="normal">    L-&gt;addBasicBlockToLoop(NewBB, &#42;LI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SplitMakesNewLoopHeader)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><Highlight kind="normal">      L-&gt;moveToHeader(NewBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If both branches are conditional, we don&#39;t have an &quot;if statement&quot;.  In</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// required anyway, we stand no chance of eliminating it, so the xform is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// probably not profitable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Pred1Br-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a7e4be8b16fbd68c9045a388904044e01">isConditional</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The only thing we have to watch out for here is to make sure that Pred2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we found a conditional branch predecessor, make sure that it branches</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to BB and Pred2Br.  If it doesn&#39;t, this isn&#39;t an &quot;if statement&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Pred1Br-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0) == BB &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><Highlight kind="normal">        Pred1Br-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(1) == Pred2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><Highlight kind="normal">      IfTrue = Pred1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><Highlight kind="normal">      IfFalse = Pred2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Pred1Br-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0) == Pred2 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><Highlight kind="normal">               Pred1Br-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(1) == BB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><Highlight kind="normal">      IfTrue = Pred2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><Highlight kind="normal">      IfFalse = Pred1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We know that one arm of the conditional goes to BB, so the other must</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// go somewhere unrelated, and this must not be an &quot;if statement&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pred1Br;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ok, if we got here, both predecessors end with an unconditional branch to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BB.  Don&#39;t panic!  If both blocks only have a single (identical)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// predecessor, and THAT is a conditional branch, then we&#39;re all ok!</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CommonPred = Pred1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a59fb91d1691350f7d1b8e8a114e3f2a4">getSinglePredecessor</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CommonPred == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> || CommonPred != Pred2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a59fb91d1691350f7d1b8e8a114e3f2a4">getSinglePredecessor</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, if this is a conditional branch, then we can use it!</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(CommonPred-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a7e4be8b16fbd68c9045a388904044e01">isConditional</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Two successors but not conditional?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0) == Pred1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><Highlight kind="normal">    IfTrue = Pred1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><Highlight kind="normal">    IfFalse = Pred2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><Highlight kind="normal">    IfTrue = Pred2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><Highlight kind="normal">    IfFalse = Pred1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
